description:
Kenshio and Shin finally have their last battle and the true mastermind is revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle to the Death! South Star vs. North Star \ The Final Battle, Kenshiro vs. Yuria?!
Shitou! Minami to tai Hokuto! / Saigo no Tatakai Kenshirou tai Julia!?
死闘! 南斗対北斗! / 最後のたたかい ケンシロウ対ユリア!?
